abstract: Greek and Turkish Cypriot leaders sent out holiday wishes during televised event, reaffirming their commitment to reaching peace accord next year.
lead_paragraph: For the first time, the Greek and Turkish Cypriot leaders of the ethnically divided Mediterranean island took to the airwaves together to send out holiday wishes in both Greek and Turkish.

headline.main: Cyprus: A Holiday Wish for Peace in 2 Languages
headline.print_headline: Europe; Cyprus: A Holiday Wish for Peace

snippet: For the first time, the Greek and Turkish Cypriot leaders of the ethnically divided Mediterranean island took to the airwaves together to send out holiday wishes in both Greek and Turkish.
